title: Patrick Mahomes, Philp Rivers, Lakers, Patriots-Steelers, and the blazing 5
itunes:title: Patrick Mahomes, Philp Rivers, Lakers, Patriots-Steelers, and the blazing 5
description:
Colin brings Kansas City Chiefs QB Patrick Mahomes down to Earth, explains why Los Angeles Chargers QB Philip Rivers is special, why the Los Angeles Lakers loss last night was good for the team, why Patriots-Steelers isn't a real rivalry, and his blazing 5 picks for the weekend. Guests include Eric Dickerson, Chris Broussard, Stephen Jackson, Derrick Johnson, and Jason McIntyre.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
